activities: PandaDoc is a software company which provides document management services to our customers, including the ability to assemble and manage contracts. When our users register for these services, they are asked to enter their names, email addresses, phone #s and their company names. This information is used to facilitate the delivery and execution of the documents that are assembled and managed by our customers.
eucountries: Belgium, Croatia, France, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: The following personal data is collected: mail, address, billing information, company and identity. This information is inputted by our customers into our service platform, and is processed by automate means. No data is manually processed.
